snippet.title: House of Golf 2 Announcement! (PS5, Xbox X/S, Steam, Epic)
snippet.description:
House of Golf 2 is coming to PS5, Xbox X/S and PC Steam and Epic Summer 2024. 

The new game is developed with Unreal 5, and coming to new consoles for the first time. It takes the fun approach of mini-golf and brings it into the home with over 100 incredible courses, gorgeous visuals, weekly tournaments, and many crazy ways to play. 

With many of its unique and tricky challenges, the game also features couch-based 4-player multiplayer and is coming in the summer of 2024.

Join our Community!

Website: www.starlightgames.co.uk 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/starlightgames6 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/starlightgames.uk/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61558754723563 
Tik Tok: https://www.tiktok.com/@starlightgamesuk?lang=en
